qualityDescription:
Quality of the output image
Higher quality means larger file size
quantizationDescription:
The degree of color and detail preservation
 Higher values mean richer colors and details
ditheringDescription:
The process of adding noise to smooth color transitions
and reduce color banding caused by quantization or compression
filterDescription: Algorithm used to resize the image
threadsDescription:
Used to process single image
Range: Number of cpu cores
suffixErrorDescription: Please enter a valid suffix name
backupDescription:
Appends ".backup" suffix
to input file(s) extension
recursiveDescription:
Saves output file(s)
preserving folder structure
pathError: Uh oh! That path is invalid
pathErrorDescription: Let's check the path and try again
